content: offering an instant pdf crochet pattern to make this warm and cozy beanie this hat will have you ready to mysteriously walk around the cold winter woods feeling like your favorite book character finished hat fits an average adult head about 20 around and 12 5 long acorn measures 3 tall and 2 wide materials needed lion brand wool ease thick & quick yarn 120 yards of kale charisma yarn by loops & threads 10 yards of pecan 10 yards of taupe poly-fil k10 5 / 6 50mm crochet hook j / 6 00mm crochet hook tapestry needle for weaving in ends pattern is written in english using standard american terms the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of gabriella rose designs this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase
